definition: Able to comprehend and analyze information, displaying a high level of mental capacity and problem-solving skills. Often used to describe individuals who possess quick thinking abilities and demonstrate a strong aptitude for learning and understanding complex concepts.

examples.german: Er ist ein sehr intelligenter Mann.
examples.english: He is a very intelligent man.

examples.german: Sie hat eine intelligente Lösung gefunden.
examples.english: She has found an intelligent solution.
